Animals and people are dying of spider venom in RackÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sleepy Arizona town, and when he and a foxy out-of-towner discover a gigantic hill of venomous spiders on a local farm they somehow donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t immediately make the connection, burn it down, and end the movie.
